about_the_game:
Your Adventure Your Story - Game with turn-based combat system and no time limit, so you can play and stop when you like.
It's not only about to click, but also about decisions. Build your team, raise your characters and choose your path.

The game is taking place in a fantasy world full of magic and age of swords. The game has lore, but story is something, that you will make.
Story is branching into many chapters and only some of them you visit with your playthrough the game. Transition between chapters is controlled by player's decisions and random elements. You can find more random elements in the game." Do you remember that super strong Yeti on snow hills? No, I met Yeti in forest and he has been pretty weak. Oh you have different story." Everybody has his own unique story and unique experience, in this game as well as in your life.
Everybody is unique, it is Your Adventure and Your Story so live your life and say YAYS!

This game is nice for relaxing and chill, you don't have to hurry on smashing button and you can take your time, take a break, whatever you want.
Good choice for travel if you don't have a powerful machine. Take a break during your study to take your mind power. Did you come from work and are you too exhaust to play action games and not ready to go to sleep? This game is better than watching the wall. Are you watching videos or streamers on second monitor and need something on your primary monitor? YAYS! Would you like to play a game where you can listen to your favorite music without sounds of fire and so on... YAYS is here.

What will your next story be?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64 bit with DX11
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: graphics card with at least 128MB of memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run 64bit windows, don't worry about anything else.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64 bit with DX11
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: graphics card with at least 256MB of memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run 64bit windows, don't worry about anything else.

short_description: Fantasy Turn-Based RPG. Make group of 1-4 characters and wander across world with rich lore, that you can fill by your imagination. The world that is never the same thanks to randomise mechanism. Every player has own story and unique experience. It is Your Adventure and Your Story! YAYS
